column4: anima..: use gstreamer packages, if u try to run mp3 in rhythombox or mplayer, it will persue u to search for it
anyone got idea to install packages in a "total" offline computer? ( I have the necessary deb packages, which I collectd from my /apt/archieves)
Look at something like the apt-zip or apt-offline package.   There are several other utilities that do the same thing.
thanks, but what are the other utilites?
